awards.title: Ruth L. Kirschstein Predoctoral Individual National Research Service Award
awards.summary: Project Title: Single-cell epigenomic roadmap of Alzheimer’s disease. Award number: 1F31AG076308-01

awards.title: American Society of Human Genetics (ASHG) Reviewer’s Choice Abstract Award
awards.summary: This award recognizes high-scoring poster abstracts for posters at the ASHG conference. I received this award for my abstract titled 'High dimensional co-expression networks enable discovery of transcriptomic drivers in complex biological systems'

awards.title: NSF-Simons Center for Multiscale Cell Fate Interdisciplinary Opportunity Award
awards.summary: I received a $10,000 interdisciplinary research opportunity award for my proposal titled 'Data-driven mathematical modeling of single-cell gene-regulatory dynamics in Alzheimer’s disease'.

awards.title: Ledell Family Research Scholarship for Science and Engineering
awards.summary: I received a $5,000 undergraduate summer research scholarship to pursue my research proposal titled 'Uncovering genome-wide diabetes risk variants in regulatory regions of pancreatic islet cells' in the Gaulton lab.

awards.title: Provost's Honors
awards.summary: Provost’s Honors recognizes students who earn a grade point average of 3.5 or above in a given term.
